title.rendered: FREE GIFT + Textbooks! + Bulk School Orders

content.rendered:
Free Gift with Any $25 Purchase of Melissa & Doug®

From now through 05/31, get a FREE “On the Go” activity pad (valued at $5.00) with ANY $25 purchase of Melissa & Doug® toys and educational products.

 

Textbook Buyback

Bring your textbooks in for cash… It’s quick and easy and we pay more than you’ll ever get from your campus bookstore! Plus, we can order most of the titles you’ll need for next semester. Let us be your one-stop textbook shop!

 

Walls of Books, Columbus Update

Seems like Walls of Books, Columbus is getting some work done this week! We are completely overhauling the old Book House location at 4508 Armour Rd. Look for the newly branded, totally transformed Walls of Books to open in June. We will be posting more updates over the next couple of weeks.

 

Bulk School Orders

Many school districts have discovered the benefits of placing their orders (both large and small) with Gottwals Books. We have relationships with multiple distributors and warehouses, allowing us to offer the lowest prices of any other book vendor. We are even cheaper than buying online!

 

New and Popular

Check out our new book section at all four Gottwals Books locations. We carry newly released titles and brand new editions of popular books and series. Our prices are the best anywhere locally, and they are comparable to what you’ll pay online.
